1:
To you, Yahweh, I cry out; my rock, do not ignore me.\q If you do not respond to me, I will join those who go down to the grave.
\q
2:
Hear the sound of my pleading when I call for help from you,\q when I lift up my hands toward your most holy place!


\q
3:
Do not drag me away with the wicked, those who do iniquity,\q who speak peace with their neighbors but have evil in their hearts.
\q
4:
Give them what their deeds deserve and repay them what their wickedness demands,\q repay them for the work of their hands and render to them their due.
\q
5:
Because they do not understand the deeds of Yahweh or the work of his hands,\q he will tear them down and never rebuild them.


\q
6:
Blessed be Yahweh\q because he has heard the sound of my pleading!
\q
7:
Yahweh is my strength and my shield;\q my heart trusts in him, and I am helped.
\q Therefore my heart greatly rejoices,
\q and I will praise him with singing.
\q
8:
Yahweh is the strength of his people,\q and he is the saving refuge of his anointed one.


\q
9: Save your people and bless your inheritance.\q Be their shepherd and carry them forever.
